text: On 13 June 2023, three people were killed and three others were hurt in three attacks in Nottingham, United Kingdom. The attacks were carried out during the early hours of the morning. == Perpetrator == At 5:30am on 13 June, 31-year- old Valdo Calocane, who is an immigrant from Guinea-Bissau, was stopped by police whilst he was driving the stolen van. He was tasered and arrested. On 16 June, he was charged with three counts of murder and three of attempted murder. == Victims == Two people killed in the attack were 19-year-old University of Nottingham students. The third victim was a 65-year-old man. The killer stole his van. He then used it to drive into three people at a bus stop. == References == Category:2023 crimes in Europe Category:2023 in England Category:2020s crimes in the United Kingdom Category:Crime in England Category:June 2023 events 2023 attacks
title: 2023 Nottingham attacks
